name: Not Meow Purroblem
description:
Iris is tired of studying and working and just wants to be a cat. Her wish comes true. While she's discovering the joy and downsides of her new form, her girlfriend Maggie is bothered by absence of her partner.

This game includes:

  • 3 endings (easy to get)
  • original soundtrack
  • 2 cute girls
  • 2.5 adorable cats!
  • an unhealthy amount of cheesiness
  • an image of covered nudity (SFW)

Story, Art and Programming by Chaotika

Music by trkv17
